Articles.Content: I can't get any fuel tanks to show up in my stages, so they don't work at all... anyone else had this problem or know how to fix it?

Fuel tanks don't show in staging anymore, that was done away with a few versions back. It just shows the fuel next to the engine icon.

Are you saying your rockets don't get fuel even when connected to tanks?

By default, fuel tanks only feed vertically* (so a central tank won't feed engines that aren't attached directly to that tank), and won't feed through any kind of separator. Anything other than that requires the yellow fuel lines.

If your engines aren't getting any fuel, it's because you didn't connect them to a fuel supply. The game does everything else for you, without you needing to explicitly put tanks into stages.

*- If you use something like a Hubmax connector, "vertical" also includes any tanks attached directly to the hub, so you can do 90-degree angles with your fuel supply. But in general, vertical means what it sounds like.
